attributes.review: Okay, I’m not sure what this whole debacle with gen z is, but I’m a millennial and I genuinely wanted to see what President Trump’s app was all about and what his plans for the election were and let me tell you I was not impressed. The UI is terrible, not to mention just hard to use overall. The app kept crashing every few minutes, and after a while I just gave up because I couldn’t get anywhere in the app. Please fix this. I think it may be time for an upgrade.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Didn’t learn a thing of what Trump’s plans for this country will be. 👎👎👎👎👎
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Trump is a stupid racist also a rapist 🖕🏾🖕🏾
attributes.title: Stupid trump app

attributes.review: Honestly this app is too confusing. Kept crashing my phone for som reason.

attributes.review: This app made my whole phone lag used all my phone storage wen I try reading something the app would glitch home and break my phone it also stole some of my information on my phone all there is to this app is reading and there was pornography all over it and there is nothing else you can’t do anything on this app I wouldn’t recommend don’t vote for the orange crack head on office 😡😡😡
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I have been a Trump Supporter for a while. So considering how good he’s done in office i thought his app would be the same. Unfortunately nope it wasn’t. It crashed multiple times and failed to work every time i opened the app. At one point it even crashed my phone and caused it to reset. This caused me to loose a bunch of data and most of the pictures on my phone. I am very displeased bu this and am hoping that this app gets fixed. Unfortunately at this point i believe its past salvation and should just be deleted in total.
attributes.title: I had so much hope

attributes.review: It put spyware and viruses on my phone. One week after using it my phone was spammed with text messages and my entire phone began glitching
attributes.title: This app was horrible
